About Align Chronicles

Who Am I?

Hey there stranger! This is Vinay Prabhu, a tinkerer, an entrepreneur and an AI researcher. I am currently CEO‚Äôing at HAL51.AI co-founded with close friend Sanghyun Han where we invent trippy hardware such as the LemurBox, the world‚Äôs first frugal-science inspired XR device that turns your boring old smartphone into a 3D Alexa. It hosts a rigged 3D avatar powered by LLMs. Guard-railing these educational avatars has given us a unique ringside-view on how ideas from AI safety manifest themselves in the real world, in the classroom and beyond. From time to time, I scribble code and ship some artsy slop to the playa at Burning Man.

PS: Here is my equally wonky personal website. Click at your own peril!

The Mission

Align Chronicles is my personal blog where I plan to float my boat filled with full/half/non baked thoughts whilst exploring the SEA of AI

üåä:$=\int_{\text{unsafe}}^{\text{safe}} \int_{\text{unethical}}^{\text{ethical}} \int_{\text{unaligned}}^{\text{aligned}} \pi(s,e,a)\delta s\,\delta e\,\delta a$

  • $\delta s$:=Safety := Ensuring AI systems do no harm.

  • $\delta e$:=Ethics := Guiding AI development with moral principles and decency

  • $\delta a$:=Alignment := Keeping AI goals consistent with human values.
